attributes.action: stop any further attempts by the EU to force a Constitution by the back door on the people of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time that the politicians in the EU finally realised that the people of Europe and in particular the UK, do NOT want a Constitution forced on them in any shape or form.  If this happens, then the Prime Minister of the UK MUST hold the promised Referendum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
